title: From sustainable fashion to superfood: Boheco’s bet on regulated ganja to create an ecosystem
text:
Bombay Hemp Company has been trying to popularise hemp fibre as a fabric and hemp seeds as a food ingredient. But building a radically new consumer category isn’t just about creating a brand. It needs an ecosystem. In this case, it means working with farmers, governments, apparel companies, and food and drug regulators.
